entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
